org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner

Class Kb

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.Kb

  • public class Kb
extends Object
    Knowledge base records the properties or result found during a scan. It is mainly used to share result among plugin when dependency arise. There are 2 types of Kb: 1. key = name. result = value. This represents kb applicable over the entire host. 2. key = url (path without query) and name. result = value. This represents kb applicable for specific path only.
